Class Dice

java.lang.Object
Dice
public class Dice extends Object
Dice mimics a real world die and is used to generate random numbers in a range. This class provides a static method to role a standard 4-sided die, but also supports creating a new dice with custom number of sides.

  • Method Details

    • getNumberOfSides

      public int getNumberOfSides()
      Returns the number of sides of this die
      Returns:
      number of sides of the die

    • roll

      public static int roll()
      Static Method that rolls a standard 4 sided die and returns a number between 1 and 4. This method uses a new random object for every call.
      Returns:
      A random number between 1 and 4.

    • rollCustom

      public int rollCustom()
      Method that rolls a n sided die object and returns a number between 1 and n. This method uses a new random object for every call.
      Returns:
      A random number between 1 and n.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string represtation of this die
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string with the number of sides
